entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
